name: Dab's Minigames
description:
Play the second one now if you want to, not forcing ya.Dab's Minigames, See what you have taken your children to in the past. See what happened to the minigames after 10 years. Who knows what happened to the mascots, it's been 10 years, y'know? The only mascot left is Dab.

What Dab Does

If a person doesn't have anyone to play with, Dabs got their back! 

Make sure to…

Look out for Dab

Make sure Dab isn't in the vents, if you spotted him, it's too late.

Don't go into the minigame, Catch the Rubber ducks because an unknown.. thing is in there. We don't talk about that at here though.

If you find Max the Red Guy, R U N

Only one problem…

Dab always has fun with the people, the only thing is,  when the place closes, who is gonna play and have fun with Dab? After all, it would be unfair to Dab considering he always keeps everyone from being lonely...

Other than that, in Dab's Minigames, you will not, I MEAN WILL, have fun :)

Oh no…

We lost the endings! Only 3 are left. Can you find them all?
